messages.body:
PROLOGUE: I have published an announcement to sell my car. In my Hotmail inbox I receive the following:




AUTOSCOUT 24



Someone has inquired about your car listing on AutoScout24

An AutoScout24 User is interested in your car listing and has sent you this e-mail.

In particular, the user has expressed an interest in your following car:

 

Audi A4 TDI, 4/5-Doors, 09/2003

Green, 100000 km, EUR 8500,-



Please contact this person:

 

Name: mr phili

E-Mail: phili101g@hotmail.com

Telephone: 000

 

Following are specific questions this person has asked about your car:

Hello,

Do you still have the Car for sale?

Phili.


Yes I have. Are U interested?
messages.raw:
MARCO

messages.body:
Hello,

 

Good to hear from you and that the vehicle is still avaliable for sale, 

before making arrangement for the payment,  i would like you to get to me 

with the recent conditions of the car, recent picture's of the car and as 

well as the last asking price for us to check up andncomfirm if we are going 

ahead with the payment of the car.

 

Payment will be made out as soon as i confirm the car ok and also were the 

car is parked.  Please kindly get to me once you recive my email, we will be 

coming for the pickup of the car as soon as the payment is paid in full.

 

Mr Phili Green.
messages.raw:
PHILI GREEN
Hello,

Good to hear from you and that the vehicle is still avaliable for sale, before making arrangement for the payment, i would like you to get to me with the recent conditions of the car, recent picture's of the car and as well as the last asking price for us to check up andncomfirm if we are going ahead with the payment of the car.

Payment will be made out as soon as i confirm the car ok and also were the car is parked. Please kindly get to me once you recive my email, we will be coming for the pickup of the car as soon as the payment is paid in full.

Mr Phili Green.

(WELL, MY ANNOUNCEMENT WAS FULL OF DETAILS AND PICS, BUT LET'S ANSWER THIS...)

messages.body:
All details are in the announcement.

What else do you need in terms of informations?
messages.raw:
MARCO
All details are in the announcement.

What else do you need in terms of informations?

messages.body: Last price!
messages.raw:
PHILI GREEN
Last price!

(OK WOW! HE IS A STRONG NEGOTIATOR...)

messages.body:
Hello,

 

So sorry for the little delay, we were only trying to make up our mind on 

the price . i am happy to tell you that your price of 8,500eur has been 

accepted and we are ready to go ahead with the payment of the car.

 

We will be paying you with a cheque payment of 11,500eur,which you must 

comfirm payment in your account first before we can come for the pick-up of 

the car, hope you understand?

 

When payment gets to you, you are required to deduct the cost of your 

vehicle which is 8,500eur and use the rest of the balance which 3,000eur for 

transportation of the car, bank commisson or charges which you are to pay to 

cash the cheque payment and other necesray things to be done in your 

location during the pick-up of the car.

 

We will also be sending an agent who is going to help out on the 

transportation of the car to my location as soon as you receive the payment 

to aviod much work or stress you too much ok. You are required to forward 

your payment information to me soonest, for us to address the cheque payment 

and send to you soonest :

 

(1)Full name

(2)Address

(3)Postal code and Country of your location

(4)And phone number.

 

All details in full for payment to be delivered to you immediately, i will 

be expecting your email soonest with the details so that we can conclude the 

sale of the car, cos i will be moving in three weeks time, as you can see i 

dont really have much time.

 

Thanks very much once and again for everything and God bless.

payment and sent it to the address you provided, it will get to you by next 

week monday, please get to me as soon as you receive the payment....

messages.body: Hi, money arrived as announced. What's the next step?
messages.raw:
MARCO
Hi, money arrived as announced. What's the next step?

(OF COURSE NOT AS ALL DATAS WERE FAKE. LET'S SEE WHAT HAPPEN NEXT)

messages.body:
Hello ,

 

Good to hear that you have received the cheque payment that was sent you, 

the cheque payment is in Pound equvilet of 11,500euro. Please you are to 

deduct the cost of your car which is 8,500eur and send the balance of the 

funds which is 3,000eur to my agent (JOHN WOOD) who is coming for the pickup 

of the car like i told.

 

Please get to the nearest WESTERN UNION MONEY TRANSFER OFFICE and send the 

balance of the payment to him at once. I have informed John Wood the agent 

that balance will be sent to him as soon as you receive the payment via 

western union for him to start-up pickup arrangement to avoid delays.

 

Remember to deduct the bank chargers for cashing the cheque in your bank 

from the 3,000eur as well as the charges to be paid at the western union 

money transfer office! all the expenses you have done must be deduct from 

the 3,000 and have the rest of the balance sent to the agent for the 

transportation of the car to our location.

 

Below is my agents details for the transfer of the funds;

 

Name:  John Wood

Address: 54 JOSEPH TROTTER, CLOSE

EC1R 1UB LONDON

UNITED KINGDOM.

 

I will be waiting for the details of the transfer as soon as the money is 

sent (MTCN NUMBER, SENDER NAME IN FULL AND OTHER INFORMATION GIVEN) I also 

need  you to get to me with your telephone number again for us to discuss on 

phone how the pickup of the car will be done and the recent place were the 

car is parked right now.

 

Thanks very much for everything and God bless.

 

Phili Green....

 

Below Are Western Union Agent locations/Addresses Close To You....

 

A.C.M. MONEY

VIA TOR DE SCHIAVI, 127

ROMA ,   RM ,   00100

 

ITALCHANGE DI E CAVALLO & C SA

VIA SOLFERINO, 6

ROMA ,   RM ,   00100

messages.body:
TWU = 1




Hello Marco,

 

Mr John Wood went to the western union and could not collect the money, he 

was told that the money was not the system, And that the MTCN NUMBER 

1741939872 is not correct, check up in the transfer slip you were given by 

the western union agent and see if the number is correct or rather go to 

were you send the money from and ask them what, that the person you sent the 

money to could not pick it up! Get to me as soon as you comfirm this and 

also i need direct telephone number i can get on or a moble so we could 

discuss how the pickup will be done, i will be waiting for your email with 

the correct details for John to pickup the funds as soon as possible.

 

 

Phili.

messages.body:
Hi, I went myself to WU that is very close to home. The employee said that the had a failure due to very high temperatures in Rome 

that collapsed the terminals cooling system. I told them this was really urgent and luckly they are very professional so reissued the 

transfer at Mr. John Wood name, but they said MTCN number has to change. Here it is the new one : 5637149666

Test question and answer is the same.



Hope this will work and your agent will come soon to pick up the car.



Rgds

messages.body:
TWU = 2



 

Marco,

 

John Wood just went to the western union money transfer office right now 

with the new MTCN NUMBER you sent 5637149666, his was told that such tranfer 

is not on record....! that the transfer is not in the computer system, 

meaning no money was transfered: i cant seem to understand what really going 

on? i tried calling your telepone number someone picked up and refused to 

talk to me...

 

Am really confused right now... am so sorry but you have to go back to that 

office and inform them on the development that the money was paid to the 

receiver, if you have the payment slip i would  want you to send me the 

transfer slip via email, scan it inform of picture and send it via email, so 

we could go to the western union office with the slip.

 

One more thing... Can please tell me why you dont want to talk to me on the 

phone or rather give me your direct phone number???????

 

Phili....

One more thing... Can please tell me why you dont want to talk to me on the phone or rather give me your direct phone number???????

Phili....

Sorry again to you and Mr John Wood... Tell him that when he will be in Italy I will invite him out for dinner!



Rgds, Marco

messages.body:
Hi, I'm so sorry for the big problem. But we are in Italy, you know...



I was said that payment was still on hold as, for security reason, the question and secret answer had to be changed as number changed!!!

I said that the employee didn't told me that!!! They excuses themselves saying that as for summer, they had to replace some people in holiday

with others not very skilled in procedure and that branch manager is in holiday. In attachment you can find a copy of the trsfer made.

I also give you personal phone number of WU employee where you can reach him in case of trouble +39087434135.

I want to solve this fast as I don't want to pay parking anymore...



Secret question is : My dog Name

Answer: Mamadou



Rgds

Now I have checked and all datas are clear and readable. Please make sure details are correct.



Question is: "what is your home town"

Answer is:   "rome"



I hope I didn't cause any trouble to you and Mr. Wood as for my mistakes.


I hope to see soon Mr. Wood and have a nice dinner with him (as promised I will pay for that!).



Rgds, Marco



PS: Please don't forget to send me a picture of you with my car. It would be nice to see you driving it in Piccadilly Circus!!!



CIAO

messages.body:
Hello,

I want to inform you that i will buy your car but i have a business proposal for you.

I work in an oil company in Iraq,Due to the war in Iraq We are not allowed to live the company till further notice please i need you to help me out I have a big problem.I will need a car for my wife who is pregnant in Greece this is why i contacted you.

On the other hand I want to inform you that I have in my possession the sum of 100,000 USD. which I won in a lottery in Indonesia during my assignment there, if i don't clam this money i will loose every thing within 9working days.

My problem now is

(1)  this money has to be paid to an account in Europe within 9working days.

(2) my wife will soon put to birth and so i need your car to be in Greece  within 12days, this was why i contacted you.

(3)  what i want from you now is to help me so i can transfer this money to your account as soon as possible from indonesia, because my wife can't have this kind of money in her account, the reason is she is not working and so has a small account to control.

(4) This now brings me to my biggest problem, how do i get the car to Greece within 12days, a car I have not seen before, I have contacted a shipper in Holloand Whom formally worked with the T&T transport caompany and he has vouched to help me and he said, if the money is going to take 9working days and i have just 3ays days to get the car to Greece then he can't do the job.

Please i don't want my wife to come out of the hospital with my baby using a cab, she needs a driver and this car asap. I will give you 10% of the 100,000USD, plus the money for the car, the shipper wants me to send him 1000euros as an advance payment so that he can come and start shipping preperation immidiately, register the car and book a place for the shipping of the car, so when the money is in your account which is in about 9days time he will just come back to drive the car to the already booked shipping space,

Please note that the 1,000 eurs money has to be sent in advance , when i send you the proof that I have made the transfer to your account,I will give you a call to inform you that i have made the payment. The 1,000 eurs has to be paid from your own pocket, this is why i want to give you 10% of the total money that will come to your account so you have 10,000USD plus the money for your car the balance of 70% i will come personal to pick it up myself.

Please if you understand this and you are willing to help me please let me have all this informations from your bank so i can start the transfer.Then i will give you the shipper's informations so that you can send to him the advance payment.

Bank informations:

1.Your complete account name and your personal addres.

2.The complete name and address of your bank.

3.Your  account number,IBAN(international bank number)  transfer

4.your personal phone number.

5. your passport.

Sir i will equally forward to you a copy of my passport at your perusal.

Regards

Mr Wittman
